meanings.definition: The people living in a particular country or area.
meanings.sent1: The populaces of the small town gathered for the annual fair.
meanings.sent2: The populaces of the city protested against the new law.
meanings.sent3: The populaces of the neighborhood were surprised by the sudden appearance of a circus.
meanings.sent4: The populaces of the forest whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The populaces of the island celebrated their unique traditions with a grand feast.

meanings.sent1: The populaces were excited to attend the free concert in the park.
meanings.sent2: The populaces eagerly awaited the announcement of the election results.
meanings.sent3: The populaces at the amusement park cheered as the roller coaster reached its peak.
meanings.sent4: The populaces of the internet flooded social media with their opinions.
meanings.sent5: The populaces in the stadium roared with excitement as their team scored a goal.
